fields.name: value
fields.renderer: return value+'%'

fields.name: time
fields.renderer: var hms = value.split(':'), h = +hms[0], suffix = (h < 12) ? 'AM' : 'PM'; hms[0] = h % 12 || 12; hms[0] = String(hms[0]).lpad('0',2); hms[1] = String(hms[1]).lpad('0',2); return hms.join(':') + ' ' + suffix

name: Between two dates
text_template: Between {start_day} at {start_time} and {end_day} at {end_time} of every month
